name: E-Caps Retuo
description:
In space, no one can hear you scream.

Welcome to E-Caps Retuo, a survival horror game set in the vast reaches of space. You, Tech Sergeant Tuanortsa, must survive the encounter with the unknown alien lifeform that has infiltrated your ship amidst a critical system failure. Discovering a new species and charting the unknown in space is great on paper, but when you encounter something you've never seen before that is trying to kill you, things get complicated.

 In E-Caps Retuo, you will:

  • Solve puzzles to fix critical systems.
  • Survive, evade, resist, and escape the alien life form that is patrolling your ship.
  • Maintain your oxygen levels, or suffocate in silence.
  • Collect power ups to bolster your evasion abilities.
  • Navigate a fully modeled and living ship.

The mission is critical, and your survival is essential to mission completion. The Central Command for Space Exploration and Discovery is counting on you to ensure that what you discover on your journey musty be brought back to mankind, even if it means avoiding a hostile alien lifeform! As you survive, keep in mind that the ship must also be fixed and at 100% functionality. You don't want to be responsible for any damages that may impact your conduct as an astronaut!
